CustomField.formula: CASE( Pickup_From_Delievery__c , "RDC", TEXT(RDC_Location__c) , "Service Center", Service_Center_Name__r.Name & BR() & Service_Center_Street_Address__c & BR() & Service_Center_City__c & ', ' & Service_Center_State__c & ' ' & Service_Center_Zip__c , "Customer", Comments_Notes__c , "Nothing Selected to Pickup From")
CustomField.label: sys Delivery From
